verses.text: \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w also|strong="H3254"\w* \w added|strong="H3254"\w*, taking \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w*, \w and|strong="H4912"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w As|strong="H5315"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* liveth, \w who|strong="H5315"\w* hath \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w my|strong="H5493"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w who|strong="H5315"\w* hath brought \w my|strong="H5493"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* bitterness,

\w As|strong="H3588"\w* \w long|strong="H5750"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* remaineth \w in|strong="H5750"\w* \w me|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w in|strong="H5750"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w nostrils|strong="H0639"\w*,

\w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w forbid|strong="H2486"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w should|strong="H0518"\w* judge \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w just|strong="H6663"\w*: \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w die|strong="H1478"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H5493"\w* innocence.

\w My|strong="H2388"\w* justification, which \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* begun \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w forsake|strong="H7503"\w*: \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H2388"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* reprehend \w me|strong="H2388"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H2388"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w ungodly|strong="H7563"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* adversary \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* hypocrite \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w through|strong="H3588"\w* covetousness \w he|strong="H3588"\w* take \w by|strong="H3588"\w* \w violence|strong="H1214"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* deliver \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*?

\w Will|strong="H0410"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w cry|strong="H6818"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*?

\w Or|strong="H0518"\w* \w can|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w delight|strong="H6026"\w* \w himself|strong="H7706"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w and|strong="H7121"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w*?

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* hath, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w conceal|strong="H3582"\w* \w it|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* know \w it|strong="H4100"\w*, \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* speak \w vain|strong="H1892"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* without cause?

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w violent|strong="H6184"\w*, \w which|strong="H2088"\w* they \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w grandsons|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w remain|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w him|strong="H6912"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H6912"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w and|strong="H1058"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w widows|strong="H0490"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3701"\w* \w heap|strong="H6083"\w* together \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w as|strong="H3701"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w raiment|strong="H4403"\w* \w as|strong="H3701"\w* clay,

He \w shall|strong="H3701"\w* \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* indeed, \w but|strong="H6662"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w man|strong="H6662"\w* \w shall|strong="H3701"\w* \w be|strong="H3701"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w it|strong="H3559"\w*: \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w shall|strong="H3701"\w* \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* hath \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w his|strong="H5341"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w as|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w moth|strong="H6211"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w as|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w keeper|strong="H5341"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w booth|strong="H5521"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3808"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w man|strong="H6223"\w* \w when|strong="H7901"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H0622"\w* \w away|strong="H0622"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H7901"\w* him: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w open|strong="H6491"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* find \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w*.

Poverty like \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* take hold \w on|strong="H4325"\w* \w him|strong="H1589"\w*, \w a|strong="H1589"\w* tempest \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* oppress \w him|strong="H1589"\w* \w in|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3915"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w A|strong="H5375"\w* burning \w wind|strong="H6921"\w* shall \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H4725"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H4725"\w* as \w a|strong="H5375"\w* whirlwind shall snatch \w him|strong="H5375"\w* \w from|strong="H4725"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spare|strong="H2550"\w*: \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* would willingly \w flee|strong="H1272"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* shall clasp \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4725"\w* shall \w hiss|strong="H8319"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, beholding \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.
